cards.prompt: STYLE_ANCHOR: high-fantasy medieval card illustration, painterly realism, rich but muted color palette, soft rim light, shallow depth of field, ornate frame hints, clean silhouette, centered composition, no text, no watermark. UNIQUE: Aldric Stormvale, battle-hardened medieval hero, detailed armor, dynamic stance, atmospheric battlefield background.

name.es: Réplica de la Tempestad de Hierro
